question: How old was Woody Herman when he founded his own orchestra?
vanilla_rag_result: Woody Herman was born on May 16, 1913, and he came to prominence in the late 1930s. While the exact year he founded his own orchestra is not specified in the passages, it is known that he was active in the late 1930s. If we assume he founded his own orchestra around 1936, he would have been 23 years old at that time. Therefore, Woody Herman was approximately 23 years old when he founded his own orchestra.
